subject: Basketball (College)
Baseball
Baseball (College)
NCAA Baseball Championships
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Pat Connaughton, a swingman who has led his Notre Dame basketball team into the round of 16, was also a pitcher for the Irish and is now a minor leaguer for the Orioles.
snippet: Pat Connaughton, a swingman who has led his Notre Dame basketball team into the round of 16, was also a pitcher for the Irish and is now a minor leaguer for the Orioles.
